author: Simon Difford
description: Being dyslexic I'm bewildered as to how to spell dyslexic, while also amused by sake (the beverage brewed from rice) being spelt the same way as sake (as in for fuck's sake!). Hopefully, you'll find this aromatic, subtly orange-influenced sake and rum-based Martini-like cocktail both delightful to drink and easy to spell.
name: For Sake's Sake
recipeIngredient: 45 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
10 ml Italicus or other Rosolio di Bergamotto / bergamot liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
